learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Consumerism vocabulary
Apply B2 Causative Passive structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: I need to have my car ______ (repair).

content.stimulus_en: She is getting her hair ______ (cut) tomorrow.
